stim_pack.name: Stim Pack
stim_pack.description: Temporarily increases attack and movement speed at the cost of HP

siege_mode.name: Siege Mode
siege_mode.description: Transform into siege mode for increased range and damage

emp_round.name: EMP Round
emp_round.description: Drains energy and shields from enemy units in area

snipe.name: Snipe
snipe.description: Deal 150 damage to a biological unit

nuke.name: Nuclear Strike
nuke.description: Call down a nuclear strike on target location

scanner_sweep.name: Scanner Sweep
scanner_sweep.description: Reveal an area and detect cloaked units

mule.name: Calldown: MULE
mule.description: Drop a MULE to accelerate mineral gathering

supply_drop.name: Calldown: Extra Supplies
supply_drop.description: Instantly complete a Supply Depot under construction

power_cannon.name: Power Cannon
power_cannon.description: Channel a devastating charged blast dealing 300 damage to a single target. 2 second charge time.

warp_jump.name: Warp Jump
warp_jump.description: Instantly teleport to a target location

cloak.name: Cloak
cloak.description: Become invisible to enemies without detection

transform_inferno.name: Transform: Inferno
transform_inferno.description: Transform into Inferno mode for close-range devastation

transform_assault.name: Transform: Assault
transform_assault.description: Transform between Fighter and Assault modes

bombardment_mode.name: Siege Mode
bombardment_mode.description: Transform into Siege Mode for long-range bombardment

high_impact_payload.name: High Impact Payload
high_impact_payload.description: Switches to high damage single target attack

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: Throw a grenade dealing area damage

unload.name: Unload
unload.description: Unload all units from the transport

anti_armor_missile.name: Anti-Armor Missile
anti_armor_missile.description: Fire a missile that reduces target armor

flak_barrage.name: Flak Barrage
flak_barrage.description: Fire a barrage of anti-air flak rounds in an area

shore_bombardment.name: Shore Bombardment
shore_bombardment.description: Devastating long-range artillery strike on ground targets

yamato_cannon.name: Yamato Cannon
yamato_cannon.description: Fire a devastating energy blast dealing massive damage

submerge.name: Submerge
submerge.description: Dive below the surface to become invisible to non-detector units

depth_charge_defense.name: Depth Charge Defense
depth_charge_defense.description: Deploy depth charges that damage nearby submarines

beach_assault.name: Beach Assault
beach_assault.description: Deploy all loaded units onto the shore

amphibious_mode.name: Amphibious Mode
amphibious_mode.description: Transition between water and land movement
